description:
Intense lobbying from the meat and dairy industry since 2020 has helped weaken and stall crucial climate policies in the European Union, according to a new report from InfluenceMap. For the past three years, agricultural industry associations such as farmers’ union COPA-COGECA, European Livestock Voice, and the European Livestock and Meat Trades Union (UECBV) have […]

The post Meat and Dairy Industry ‘Weakening’ Climate Policy in the EU: Report  appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Meat and Dairy Industry ‘Weakening’ Climate Policy in the EU: Report

description:
A fossil fuel funded think tank with close ties to the Hungarian government hosted a meeting of climate science critics in Brussels last Thursday (23 May), to challenge the EU “consensus” on the environment. Speakers from a range of anti-regulation groups shared their ideas two weeks before citizens across the bloc prepare to vote in […]

The post Oil Funded Think Tank Gathers Climate Deniers Ahead of Crucial EU Elections appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Oil Funded Think Tank Gathers Climate Deniers Ahead of Crucial EU Elections
